ygData.subject: Re: Atrus's Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Atrus, don t let it stress you out too much that others have leveled faster than you for whatever reason.  I ve always had at least 2 characters in whichever
ygData.messageBody:
Atrus, don't let it stress you out too much that others have leveled faster than
you for whatever reason. I've always had at least 2 characters in whichever
online RPG I ventured to. My rpg roots are in Neverwinter Nights. I have
characters in 2 guilds and those 2 characters have followed me to each game
I've gone to after the cataclysm destroyed that world. Therefore I almost
always level slower than others around me because I try to devote equal time to
the two guilds. I look for others around my level and can almost always find
someone to hunt with. Take heart...there are others out there like you.

Iggie
Gnome Wizard
Cazic Thule
